property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} {ABARECHAIN}: Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if it's the first attack this turn, you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck. If you do, put one of them into your shield zone face down and the other into your mana zone. ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water/Darkness 2(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water/Darkness 2.) ■ When you put this creature, each of your creatures gets "slayer" until the start of your next turn. ■ When you put this creature, draw a card for each of your tapped creatures in the battle zone. Then for each card drawn this way, discard a card from your hand.

property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a card from your hand. property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may return a shield to your hand. However, you can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. ■ You may shieldify a card from your hand. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Mutopia/Bikkuri Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {W4} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Water 4 to summon this creature this turn.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Those creatures can't attack or block until the start of your next turn. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.value: Mafi Gang/Team Zero

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water 2(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water 2.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature taps, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {OSHIOKIMOON}: Whenever a card leaves your shield zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Jokers/Team Kirifuda

property.name: Rules
property.value: {Kirifudash} {F2} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Fire 2 to summon this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that cost more than the number of cards in your opponent's mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, ignore effects that would prevent creatures from leaving the battle zone this turn. ■ Destroy all creatures that have power 4000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put up to 2 cards from your hand into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command/Demon Command/Gekko Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your light or darkness creatures are destroyed, if it's your first creature destroyed this turn, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, put that creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Gekko Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have at least one light creature and at least one darkness creature in the battle zone, you may choose both: ► Put the top card of your deck into your shield zone face down: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then put one of your shields into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger".

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Bouken Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have at least one light creature and at least one nature creature in the battle zone, you may choose both: ► Put all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less into your opponent's mana zone: ► Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures and put it into its owner's shield zone face up.

property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ Whenever one of your water or darkness creatures leaves the battle zone, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Team Zero

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have at least one water creature and at least one darkness creature in the battle zone, you may choose both: ► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, they can't attack or block: ► Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

card.name: 「Celebrate! The final curtain of this story!」

property.name: Race
property.value: Bikkuri Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {WF4|spell} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Water/Fire 4 | s p e l l to summon this creature this turn.) ■ Draw a card. Then put a water or fire creature that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone. That creature gets "speed attacker". At the end of the turn, put that creature on the top of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Bikkuri Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have at least one water creature and at least one fire creature in the battle zone, you may choose both: ► Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them on the bottom of your deck. Then you may draw a card: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMRP-15 Phantom Dragon x Swift Attack Genmu Emperor!!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONIEND}: Whenever a creature attacks, if there is a player that has no shields and you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among the cards put into your graveyard in this way, choose a darkness or fire non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less and put it. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is in your graveyard and you have at least one light card and one darkness card in your mana zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, put this creature into the battle zone and put one of your shields into your graveyard. {OSHIOKIMOON}: Whenever a card leaves your shield zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. At the start of your opponent's next turn, that creature doesn't untap.
